underlying_goal: Add several permission entries to the global settings.json file.
primary_success: Correctly read a JSON configuration file, identified which of the requested entries were already present, and idempotently added only the missing entries.
brief_summary: The user requested to add a list of Bash and WebFetch permissions to the global settings.json file. Claude read the file, correctly noted that two of the requested permissions were already present, and then added the remaining five missing permissions to the 'allow' list.
